{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-17T07:04:13.000Z", "description": "Site Reliability Engineer

Position Type: Contract

Location: Raritan, NJ

Job Description

Requirements:
  • 5+ years of experience in application management services
  • Experience in managing big data and large scale data applications, ticket management, ticket triaging, service now integration, JIRA integration
  • Experience in leading large teams in Onsite/ Offshore and must have worked in AI OPS and automation of ticket management
  • Strong interpersonal skills are required along with the ability to work in an agile & dynamic product-oriented team on challenging projects

Qualifications

BS/MS in Computer Science or Computer Engineering

Good verbal and written communication skills in English
